name: javawebscraper
description: Welcome to the VS Code Java world. Here is a guideline to help you get started to write Java code in Visual Studio Code.

scripts.build: cd src && javac -cp ..\lib\selenium-libs.jar;..\lib\junit-4.13.2.jar App.java && jar cvf App.jar ..\lib\selenium-libs.jar ..\lib\junit-4.13.2.jar App.class
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run start
